==About VirtualBox 4.3.10==
VirtualBox is a general-purpose full virtualizer for x86 hardware, targeted at server, desktop and embedded use.


{{images/VirtualBox.jpg}}
==Features of VirtualBox 4.3.10==
# No hardware virtualization is required 
# Guest Additions: shared folders, seamless windows, 3D virtualization
# Multigeneration branched snapshots
# Clean architecture; unprecedented modularity
# Remote machine display
# Great hardware support: guest multiprocessing (SMP), USB device support, hardware compatibility, full ACPI support, multiscreen resolutions, built-in iSCSI support, PXE Network boot
# Supported hosts: Windows, Mac OS X, Linux
